mutants.code:
def can_make_banner(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if it is possible to make the banner with the desired text (s1)
    from the borrowed banner text (s2) by cutting in at most two different places.

    Parameters:
    s1 (str): The string that Ed wants to display on his banner.
    s2 (str): The string that is already printed on the borrowed banner.

    Returns:
    str: "possible" if it is possible to make the banner, otherwise "not possible".
    """
    if s1 not in s2:
        return 'possible'
    else:
        return 'not possible'

def can_make_banner(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if it is possible to make the banner with the desired text (s1)
    from the borrowed banner text (s2) by cutting in at most two different places.

    Parameters:
    s1 (str): The string that Ed wants to display on his banner.
    s2 (str): The string that is already printed on the borrowed banner.

    Returns:
    str: "possible" if it is possible to make the banner, otherwise "not possible".
    """
    if s1 in s2:
        return ''
    else:
        return 'not possible'

def can_make_banner(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    """
    Determines if it is possible to make the banner with the desired text (s1)
    from the borrowed banner text (s2) by cutting in at most two different places.

    Parameters:
    s1 (str): The string that Ed wants to display on his banner.
    s2 (str): The string that is already printed on the borrowed banner.

    Returns:
    str: "possible" if it is possible to make the banner, otherwise "not possible".
    """
    if s1 in s2:
        return 'possible'
    else:
        return ''
